vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire a tract of vacant land containing approximately 27,782 square feet from Paul E. Wainwright and Ruby Lee Wainwright, located in Dallas County for the Southwest 120/96-inch Water Transmission Pipeline Project - Not to exceed $51,591.00 ($48,091.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,500.00) - Financing: Water Capital Improvement E Funds ($17,000.00) and Water Construction Funds ($34,591.00)
